post.body: I nominate @MariSmith for a Shorty Award in #socialmedia 'cuz she's fun, friendly and provides heaps of useful Facebook tips!
Ah, thanks, mystery solved re screen! Yes, seeing the sun certainly brightens up winter days.
What's with your screen? Totally with you about the new year - I bought some Jan-Dec dividers today in anticipation :D
I'm good thanks, trying to get productive ;) And how are you on this fine & sunny Tuesday?
I think the crowds are making the most of shopping while they still can! Agree w/you about Adams, & they won't be the last :-(
Good morning Jackie & thanks for the wise words. It's scary, I can tell you!! BTW, love the hat :D
I always find days between Xmas & New Year brilliant for reflecting, decluttering & planning. How about you?
Good morning to you! I had a most enjoyable & relaxing time thanks. Like you, I'm excited to get back to doing what I love ;-)
Great - glad to hear it. I'm just getting ready to go out for a brisk walk. Many layers of clothing will be needed ;-)
Morning Paul. Yes it looks lovely out there doesn't it? How are you feeling today?
It wasn't as cold as I thought (though still had to de-ice the car). Roads are lovely and quiet - unless you're heading for the shops ;-)
I don't want to, but I need to go out. Better wrap up warm. I may be gone some time .... ;-)
A new day dawning - very cold again. Glad I left heating on low o/night, not something I usually do but couldn't get warm yesterday at all.
Time to go offline & spend the rest of the evening relaxing & reading. Until tomorrow!
Just deciding to 'blow up' website. Take a deep breath & stand well clear of falling pages ... this could take a while ;-)
Tackling my biggest admin. backlog & making progress... slow... but it's progress. Am determined not to let this build up again in 2009 ;-)
Sun just coming up on another very cold & frosty day. Time to get back to work after relaxing & recharging batteries. A coffee would help ;)
Going to read more of my Christmas books now & relax for the rest of the day. I hope you enjoy your Sunday too!
Yep, it's cold out there!! Warming up with a coffee now, debating what to do now ... determined not to do much work today though ;-)
Another bright but very cold day here. Will have to go out for a walk later ... today is a day for 'pottering about' ... no need to rush.
